contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} '''Tramway''' may refer to: * [[Tramway (industrial)]], a lightly laid railway for uses such as logging or mining (the original use of the word) * A system of [[tram]]s (public transport vehicles running on rails) * [[Aerial tramway]] * [[Tramway, North Carolina]] (locality in the United States) *[[Tramway (arts centre)]] (centre for visual and performing arts in Glasgow, United Kingdom) *''[[Tramway (film)]]'' a short film by Polish director Krzysztof KieÅ›lowski ==See also== * [[Industrial railway]] * [[Tramways Act 1870]] {{disambig}}
